resources.string: Did you make it into the top ten?

You\'re too slow, time is up! This snail pace will cost you a life!
So sad, your answer \'%s\' is totally wrong. It\'s not even a decent number.
So sad, your answer %s is wrong. It should be %s. You loose a life and the streak.
Are you sure you want to leave now, you will lose momentum!
Extra congratulations to you! This is your %s %s answers win streak. You get an extra life and you receive %s * %s = %s bonus points!
You ranked  %1s  on the high score list. Enter your name and claim your place!
Currently you are NOT registered online and you DO NOT compete in the global competition
Currently you are registered online and you compete in the global competition
No worries, just let us know how you want to play!
Looking at the data it would seem that you are not registered and not connected to the global competition.
I just want to play anonymously
Sure, if you are boring and scared you can do this. You won\'t be able to humiliate other players and calculate them back to the stone age.
I will register but I won\'t compete online

Yeah! It\'s time...for GLORY ! Flex the competition to a different universe with your math skills. Become the Math Magician you where destined to be!
Let us know how you want to play...
You do not play online, no score here!
Don\'t want to play online anymore ??

No worries, just uncheck \"Compete online\" right above me and hit \"Save\" below. All your online data, if any, will be deleted.\nYour local data will be save and untouched and that, of course, includes your precious HIGH SCORES.\nYou can go back online and compete at any time. Just check \"Compete online\" and hit \"Save\". Soon enough you will be calculating the competition to another galaxy!.üëå

Just check \"Compete online\" right above me and hit \"Save\" below. Your already achieved HIGH SCORES will be submitted to the internet and you start competing and flexing your calculation skills ü§ì immediately.\nHad enough?
